resources.string: If you use biometrics with this app, it could be accessed by anyone who can unlock your phone with their biometrics or with your phone\'s pin or pattern.
You can turn off biometrics anytime in the app settings.
Use your face, fingerprint or iris to:
unlock the app within 30 minutes of signing in with Welcome to GOV.UK One Login
You can unlock the app with your face, fingerprint or iris within 30 minutes of signing in with GOV.UK One Login.
You need to update your phone settings
To add documents, you need to protect your phone with a pin or a pattern.
This is to make sure no one else can view or add documents to your app.
You need to go to your phone settings and:
Find the option to set up a pin or pattern to unlock your phone - this is usually in Device unlock or Lock screen.
Come back to continue using your documents.
To add documents, you need to allow this app to use your face, fingerprint or iris. This is to keep your documents secure.
When you use biometrics, anyone who can unlock your phone with their biometrics or with your phone\'s pin or pattern might be able to access your app.
